status.description: Indicates whether the asset is active or not

description.description: A brief description of the asset

serial.description: The serial number of the asset

productId.description: The _id of the product associated with the asset

accountId.description: The _id of the account associated with the asset

status.description: The status of the asset bundle (active/inactive)

productBundleId.description: The unique identifier of the product bundle associated with the asset bundle

accountId.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the asset bundle

assets.description: An array of assets grouped by product index

items.description: An array of asset IDs for a specific product
The unique identifier of an asset

manufacturerAccountId.description: The ID of the manufacturer account.

manufacturerProductNumber.description: The manufacturer's product number for the product.

vendors.description: The list of vendors for the product.

accountId.description: The ID of the vendor account.

vendorProductNumber.description: The vendor's product number for the product.

status.description: The status of the product bundle.

name.description: The name of the product bundle.

description.description: The description of the product bundle.

products.description: The list of product IDs included in the bundle.
